name: Jerry Akter
comment: The best customer service I have ever experienced when filing a claim. Speedy process from start to finish. Never been so satisfied with an insurance claim before.

name: Hasim Sarkar
comment: My claims process was super easy and my adjuster kept me in the loop every step of the way

name: Alisba Khan
comment: I am absolutely in love with Root! It's quick, easy, and completely affordable.

name: Walid Khan
comment: Filed a claim and received payment 7 days later!! Answered all of my questions on the spot. Great customer service, great company.

name: Jeny Sun
comment: I saved around $90 per month going to Root. I also had a claim and they got back to me within a day. Great customer service!!

name: Pritom Sarkar
comment: I love that Root is so much more affordable than all the other insurance companies I've gotten quotes from. We have better coverage and more options and are saving $60/mo.
